medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain, localized to right lower quadrant
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started one night ago, gradually localizing to the right lower quadrant overnight and worsening. Associated with nausea, no vomiting, fevers, chills, diarrhea, or constipation. Denies urinary or other symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, eczema, fibroids, left dermoid ovarian cyst status post resection.
